title: IAA Tonight | Robert Sarver Selling the Suns AND Pro Football Hall of Fame Nominees
description: Phoenix Suns and Mercury owner Robert Sarver has announced that he began the process of selling the franchises after being suspended for one-year for using racist and misogynistic language. Leger Douzable and Brandon Flowers discuss what this means for the NBA and if they dropped the ball. Also, Pro Football Hall of Fame 2023 nominees were announced today. Who deserves to get in?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Brandon Flowers)
